artist: Designer: Larsen Design Studio, New York; Mill: The Thai Silk Co. Ltd.; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: Handwoven & handprinted with 16" pomegranite like designs separated by 19" "Lazy S". Vert. rpt. 36"; horiz. 18.75". green, brown & lilac. Quarrystone
image_copyright: © Jack Lenor Larsen%2C Inc.%2C Larsen Design Studio
text: Pomegranate captured the essence of dramatic and highly valued 19th-century Central Asian ikats (fabrics whose yarns are resist-dyed before weaving), which were beginning to appear in Western art galleries. This pattern was introduced as part of the Afghan collection, along with several textiles that Jack Larsen’s visit to Afghanistan in the early 1970s inspired. Pomegranate was discontinued in 1994.
title: Pomegranate
